mapinfo.detailsText:
Baja California is an arid peninsular region divided in two by a mountain range.
 Hunts and trees are scarce and scattered, but precious metals are rather common.
 Expand toward the center or on the sea to ensure extra resources for your colony.
 
 Native Civs: Apache / Navajo 
 Mercenaries: Comanchero / Renegado 
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_heavy_infantry)> <u>Player Setup in Observer Mode</u>
 -1v1: FFA
 -2v2: 1+2 vs 3+4
 -3v3: 1+2+3 vs 4+5+6
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_ceasefire)> <u>Observer Setup</u>
 -Team does not matter
 -Don't use Iroquois / Aztec / Sioux!
 
 Designed by Garja 
 Observer UI by Aizamk
